entities.name: lake
entities.description: The lake is described as coming nearer and nearer to Harry.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A Patronus is mentioned as a silvery creature that can be conjured by wizards.

entities.name: bush
entities.description: Harry throws himself behind the bush to hide from the dementors.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are described as a group of dark creatures that are feared by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and is trying to conjure a Patronus.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Harry's father is mentioned as someone who should be coming to help him, but it turns out to be Harry himself.

relationships.description: Harry conjures a Patronus using the spell 'EXPECTO PATRONUM'.
Dementors are feared by Harry, who is trying to protect himself from them.
